template.XULMeth2("addTab", "( URL, {referrerURI: ..., charset: ..., postData: ..., owner: ..., allowThirdPartyFixup: ..., relatedToCurrent: ... })")

dl.dd: Opens a new tab that loads a page with the specified URL. The rest of the parameters are optional. The row of tabs will appear if needed.

dd.span: fx_minversion_note("3.6", "The second form of this method was added in Firefox 3.6; it allows you to specify the parameters by name, in any order. It also adds the relatedToCurrent parameter; Firefox uses this to decide whether the new tab should be inserted next to the current tab.")

dl.dd: See Code snippets:Tabbed browser for examples.
See Preprocessing POST Data for preparing postData out of a string
